titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to include in each national defense strategy steps to strengthen the United States industrial base and to assure an uninterrupted supply of medicines, and for other purposes.
Pharmaceutical Independence Long-Term Readiness Reform Act
Pharmaceutical Independence Long-Term Readiness Reform Act
Pharmaceutical Independence Long-Term Readiness Reform Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Veterans' Affairs, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
